body_html: @gautamkmr Thank you. To clarify on my previous comment: MKL-DNN currently depends on a library called MKLML, this library is dynamically linked to libtensorflow*.so. However, the MKL-DNN code is compiled and linked into .so static.
body_text: @gautamkmr Thank you. To clarify on my previous comment: MKL-DNN currently depends on a library called MKLML, this library is dynamically linked to libtensorflow*.so. However, the MKL-DNN code is compiled and linked into .so static.
body: @gautamkmr Thank you. To clarify on my previous comment: MKL-DNN currently depends on a library called MKLML, this library is dynamically linked to libtensorflow*.so. However, the MKL-DNN code is compiled and linked into .so static.
